title: They Came to Help Us
description: "Aged thirty-five, Charlotte had led an idealistic lifestyle under the regime of the Martians who came to Earth to save us from self-destruction in the year 2015.On the birth of her second daughter Holly, Charlotte began to realize that all was not has it appeared. There had been a price for the help the Martians had given. Was the cost too high?Having being kept in the dark for thirty-five years, she was now on a mission to complete her education, fighting against her familyâ€™s advice and her own emotions. Is she endangering herself and others? Does she have the strength to overcome her mental demons? Or will she turn a blind eye and allow them to deceive many mothers without their consent? Just because our (predominantly male) government had made an agreement."
author: Lynn Whyte-Heath
